title: Ads
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to YES Network page
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on any ads displayed in the page
custom_expected: THEN the user will be redirected to that ad's page

title: Current Matchup's Header
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to YES Network homepage
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on the current matchup's header
custom_expected: THEN the user will be redirected to the Gameday page of that matchup

title: YES Headline
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to YES Network homepage
custom_steps: WHEN the user scrolls to the Headline section
custom_expected:
THEN the section will display the following:

* Headline title and image 
* Link text to the article (for example, Final)
* 3 more headlines related to the current headline

THEN the page will be displayed complete and neat (no typographical errors, no overlapping and/or missing icons/texts)

THEN the wait time for the page to load will not be longer than 5 secs

THEN the user will be able to scroll through the page smoothly

THEN the user will be able to pinch in/out and zoom in/out of the page

THEN tapping on the link texts will bring the user to the page associated with it

title: YES Videos
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to YES Network homepage
custom_steps: WHEN the user scrolls to the Video section below the headline
custom_expected:
THEN the section will display the following:

* Thumbnail of the video with a play button in it
* Title of the video
* More Videos link text

THEN the section will display the featured media

THEN the section will be displayed complete and neat (no typographical errors, no overlapping and/or missing icons/texts)

THEN the wait time for the section to load will not be longer than 5 secs

THEN the user will be able to scroll through the page smoothly

THEN the user will be able to pinch in/out and zoom in/out of the page

THEN tapping on the video or the video title will redirect the user to that video's page, play the video, and the video player will work as expected

THEN tapping on More Videos will redirect the user to http://web.yesnetwork.com/media/video.jsp

title: YES Header Menu
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to YES Network
custom_steps: WHEN the YES Network header loads
custom_expected:
THEN the header will display the following:

* YES logo
* Yankees
* Nets
* NYCFC
* NFL
* Video
* More
* Facebook icon
* Twitter icon
* Instagram icon
* Newsletter icon
* Search field

THEN tapping on the YES Network logo will redirect the user to the YES Network homepage

THEN tapping/hovering on Yankees, Nets, NYCFC, NFL, and Video will display the submenu

THEN the page will be displayed complete and neat (no typographical errors, no overlapping and/or missing icons/texts)

THEN the wait time for the page to load will not be longer than 5 secs

THEN the user will be able to scroll through the page smoothly

THEN the user will be able to pinch in/out and zoom in/out of the page

THEN the users will be able to click on buttons/elements and these will work

custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on RSS Feeds
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be redirected to http://web.yesnetwork.com/rss/index.jsp

THEN the wait time for the menu to load will not be longer than 5 secs

THEN the user will be able to scroll through the page smoothly

THEN the user will be able to pinch in/out and zoom in/out of the page

THEN the users will be able to click on buttons/elements and these will work

THEN tapping on the link texts will redirect to the page associated with it

title: User sees Featured Article on homepage
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has scrolled down and is at the Top Stories section
custom_expected:
THEN they will be able to see a featured News Article with a large thumbnail and metadata (ex: introduction to article), 
along with other News Articles with smaller thumbnails and no metadata.

title: User sees More Stories button
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has scrolled down and is at the Top Stories section
custom_steps:
WHEN the user scrolls to the end of the Top Stories
section
custom_expected:
THEN they will be able to see a "More Stories" button that, upon being clicked, will display more news articles to the user 
in reverse chronological order.

GIVEN:

User is viewing the page on X large screen (1024+)

WHEN

Verify these are the specs:

Full width hero image with caption and 3 headlines of related content
2 Gracenote Modules + 300x250 ad
Top Stories mixed feed in a 3x3 grid

  -Display 8 items, plus one 300x250 ad slot in the mixed feed"
3 More from Yes modules
Blogs module, YES Corporate Module, and 300x250 ad slot
custom_expected:
THEN:

The specs are as specified
